issue.title: Trusty: remote_endpoint: Transport endpoint is not connected

content.raw: Even if the boost bug is fixed, isn't there an (admittedly unlikely) race condition? The connection could be create successfully, OnConnect could be called, and the server could die right at that moment. OnConnect seems to assume that if "_error" is zero upon entering the function, that the connection does not die during the call. Maybe it is a good idea to handle errors from GetRemoteEndpoint anyway?
